title: SQL Injection via Error Based
mitigation: Use parameterized queries and prepared statements

title: SQL Injection via Union Based
mitigation: Input validation and parameterized queries

title: SQL Injection via Boolean Based Blind
mitigation: Consistent response handling and parameterized queries

title: SQL Injection via Time Based Blind
mitigation: Query timeout controls and input validation

title: Command Injection
mitigation: Avoid system calls with user input and use safe APIs

title: LDAP Injection
mitigation: LDAP query parameterization and input validation

title: XPath Injection
mitigation: XPath parameterization and input validation

title: XML External Entity (XXE) Injection
mitigation: Disable external entity processing in XML parsers

title: Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) - Reflected
mitigation: Output encoding and Content Security Policy

title: Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) - Persistent
mitigation: Input sanitization and output encoding

title: Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) - DOM Based
mitigation: Secure DOM manipulation practices

title: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF)
mitigation: CSRF tokens and SameSite cookie attributes

title: Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF)
mitigation: URL validation and network access restrictions

title: Path Traversal
mitigation: Path validation and access controls

title: File Upload Restriction Bypass
mitigation: File type validation and upload restrictions

title: JWT Vulnerability (Algorithm Confusion)
mitigation: Strict JWT algorithm validation and signature verification

title: JWT Vulnerability (Weak Secret)
mitigation: Strong JWT signing keys and proper secret management

title: URL Redirection
mitigation: Whitelist allowed redirect destinations

title: ForwardedHeaderFilter
mitigation: Validate and sanitize forwarded headers

title: CORS Misconfiguration
mitigation: Restrict CORS to trusted origins only

title: Insecure Deserialization
mitigation: Avoid deserializing untrusted data or use safe serializers

title: Template Injection
mitigation: Template sandboxing and input validation

title: Email Injection
mitigation: Email header validation and sanitization

title: Race Condition
mitigation: Atomic operations and proper synchronization

title: Spring4Shell (CVE-2022-22965)
mitigation: Update Spring Framework and validate class access patterns

title: Log4j RCE (CVE-2021-44228)
mitigation: Update Log4j and disable JNDI lookup functionality

title: GraphQL IDOR
mitigation: GraphQL authorization and access control validation

title: GraphQL Injection
mitigation: GraphQL query validation and depth limiting

title: Authorization Bypass
mitigation: Comprehensive authorization checks on all endpoints

title: Missing Authentication
mitigation: Implement authentication on all protected resources

title: Weak Cryptography
mitigation: Use strong cryptographic algorithms and proper key management

title: Insecure Random Number Generation
mitigation: Use cryptographically secure random number generators

title: Clickjacking
mitigation: X-Frame-Options header and frame-ancestors CSP directive

title: Content Security Policy Bypass
mitigation: Strict CSP policy without unsafe-inline or unsafe-eval

title: SQL Injection via Hibernate
mitigation: Use Hibernate parameterized queries and criteria API

title: NoSQL Injection (MongoDB)
mitigation: Input validation and parameterized NoSQL queries

title: Session Management Issues
mitigation: Configure session cookies with secure: true, httpOnly: true, sameSite: 'strict', and proper session timeout

title: Information Disclosure
mitigation: Remove sensitive information from responses and configure error handling

title: Improper Input Validation
mitigation: Comprehensive input validation and sanitization

title: Business Logic Bypass
mitigation: Server-side business rule validation

title: Prototype Pollution
mitigation: Object.create(null) and input validation for object keys

title: Expression Language Injection
mitigation: Avoid dynamic expression evaluation with user input

title: OGNL Injection
mitigation: Disable OGNL evaluation and validate expressions

title: Mass Assignment
mitigation: Whitelist allowed object properties for binding

title: HTTP Host Header Injection
mitigation: Host header validation and whitelist

title: Parameter Pollution
mitigation: Proper parameter parsing and validation

title: Regex DoS (ReDoS)
mitigation: Safe regex patterns and input validation

title: XML Injection
mitigation: XML input validation and safe parsing

title: CRLF Injection
mitigation: Input validation and header sanitization

title: Zip Slip Vulnerability
mitigation: Validate zip entry paths and restrict extraction locations
